review: We love Amazon Fire Stick! Prime has great programming now, where as a year ago I didn't care for what I found there. I'm excited to finally have access to Netflix and Hulu in my bedroom, and I love that it has pretty screen savers.My favorite part is the iPhone remote app. Voice search has changed my life!
author: Denelle Pantleo

review: Easy to set up and, when it works, it's great!  Problem is that it won't hold an internet connection longer than 30 minutes!  Tried on my own several times after reading the on-line Amazon fixes, then called Amazon.  Customer service very helpful and, of course, it worked the entire time I was on the phone with them.  Ten minutes after hanging up - no connection!!  My wireless service is fine - something is wrong with the stick (yes, I was using the extender).  Returning it today - have to say again that Amazon customer service is terrific.  I won't hold this against them but do not recommend the Fire TV Stick - way too much frustration!
